name: Cando.js
tagline: A canvas wrapper for lightweight animations. Ideal for simple animated UI elements in the 2d rendering context.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
[More info: http://dtex.github.com/canDo.js/](http://dtex.github.com/canDo.js/ "More info").

canDo.js is a canvas wrapper for simple animations. It is ideal for animating UI elements (i.e. buttons with fancy hover states). In a nutshell, canDo.js proxies the methods of the HTML Canvas 2D Context. It allows you to define a timeline, keyframes and easing functions.

canDo.js is distributed under the MIT License.
